LocaleLayout.title: Liz Salcedo - Graphic Designer
LocaleLayout.description: A beautiful portfolio where you will be able to see all of my work.

Home.name: Liz Salcedo!
Home.introduction-1: A Colombian graphic designer living in Spain.
Home.introduction-2: For me it has always been important to find different and creative ways to communicate, and this space was born for that reason; to be a fun and dynamic portfolio where you can get to know my projects.
Home.welcome: Welcome to Be-Graphic, I hope we can work together.
